Title: Authorizes the county of Clinton, to employ retired former members of the division of state police as special patrol officers
Summary: Authorizes the county of Clinton to employ retired former members of the division of state police as special patrol officers.
LawCode: Amd ยง58, Civ Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the civil service law, in relation to employment of retired members of the division of state police as special patrol officers in in the county of Clinton
